text:
Memang benar sih tapi sebelum Wei Wuxian protes Lan Wangji membuka kantong qiangkun yang lain dan dua karung beras, satu karung tepung keluar. Kali ini para wens dan Wei Wuxian tidak lagi ternganga, mereka nyaris menjerit!
“Lan Zhan!! Ini.. ini terlalu berlebihan!”
“Wei Ying dan A-Yuan butuh yang lain selain sayur,” jawabnya lagi dengan ekspresi datar tapi nada bicaranya terdengar begitu bangga.
“Lan Zhan sungguh ini semua tidak perlu—LAN WANGJI?!?!” Kali ini Wei Wuxian menjerit saat melihat selimut tebal keluar dari kantong qiangkun yang terakhir.
Selimut itu putih bersih, tebal dan terlihat begitu halus. Sudah pasti salah satu selimut berkualitas mahal yang dijual di kota besar.
Lan Wangji menunjukkannya ks Wei Wuxian dan A-Yuan di pangkuannya yang segera memeluk selimut itu erat. “Haluuusss dan empukk!”
trans:
It was true, but before Wei Wuxian could protest, Lan Wangji opened another qiangkun bag, and out came two sacks of rice and one sack of flour. This time, the wens and Wei Wuxian were no longer speechless; they were practically screaming!
“Lan Zhan!! This... this is too much!”
“Wei Ying and A-Yuan need more than just vegetables,” he replied again with a flat expression, but his tone sounded so proud.
“Lan Zhan, really, all of this isn’t necessary—LAN WANGJI?!?!” This time, Wei Wuxian screamed when he saw a thick blanket coming out of the last qiangkun bag.
The blanket was pristine white, thick, and looked so soft. It was definitely one of those high-quality blankets sold in big cities.
Lan Wangji held it up for Wei Wuxian and A-Yuan, who quickly hugged the blanket tight. “So soft and fluffy!”
